\begin{pspicture}[showgrid=true](-.7,-.5)(7.8,9)
   %\sbPSTGridDev
   \sffamily
   \psset{labelstyle=\footnotesize,labeloffset=0.5}
   \pnode(0,1){IA}
   \pnode(0,2){IB}
   \pnode(7,2){IC}
   \pnode(2,4){ID}
   \pnode(3.4,8.5){IE}
   \optbox[labeloffset=0,endbox](IB)(IA)
      {\rput{90}{\rput(0,+.5em){Dioden-}\rput(0,-.5em){laser}}}
   \mirror[variable,mirrortype=extended,mirrorradius=1,labeloffset=0.4](IA)(IB)(IC){OAP}
   \mirror[variable,mirrortype=extended](IB)(IC)(ID){SP1}
   \mirror[variable,mirrortype=extended](IC)(ID)(IE){SP2}
   \optdetector[labeloffset=1,labelangle=15](ID)(IE){Detektor}
   \psline[linecolor=blue,linewidth=1.5pt,linearc=0.012]
      (0.05,1.0)
      (0.05,2.025)
      (7.0,2.025)
      (2.00,4.04)
      (3.39,8.5)

   \pnode(6.0,4.0){RA}
   \pnode(6.0,0.5){RB}
   \pnode(1.5,0.5){RC}
   \pnode(1.5,2.0){RD}
   \pnode(7.0,2.0){RE}
   \optbox[endbox,labeloffset=0](RB)(RA){
      \rput{90}{\rput(0,+.5em){Justage-}\rput(0,-.5em){laser}}
   }
   \mirror[variable,mirrortype=extended](RA)(RB)(RC){SP3}
   \mirror[variable,mirrortype=extended](RB)(RC)(RD){SP4}
   \beamsplitter[bssize=0.3,labelangle=315](RC)(RD)(RE){ST}
   \psline[linecolor=red,linewidth=1.5pt,linearc=0.012]
      (6.0,4.0)
      (6.0,0.525)
      (1.5,0.525)
      (1.5,1.975)
      (7.0,1.975)
      (2.03,3.975)
      (3.445,8.5)

   % Chopper
   \psline[linewidth=1.5pt](2.0,1.80)(2.0,1.95)
   \psline[linewidth=1.5pt](2.0,2.05)(2.0,2.30)
   \rput(2.0,1.6){\footnotesize CP}
   % Plasmareaktor
   \optbox[optboxheight=1.5,optboxwidth=2.5](ID)(IE){}
   \rput{-17}(3.10,7.4){
      \psline[linewidth=3pt,linecolor=blue!40!white](-.5,0)(.5,0)
   }
   \rput{-17}(2.35,5.05){
      \psline[linewidth=3pt,linecolor=blue!40!white](-.5,0)(.5,0)
   }
   \rput{73}(1.8,6.6){\footnotesize Plasmareaktor}
   \rput[l](4,6){\footnotesize NaCl-Fenster}
   \psline[arrows=->,linestyle=dashed,dash=2pt 2pt](4,6)(2.6,5.04)
   \psline[arrows=->,linestyle=dashed,dash=2pt 2pt](4,6)(3.4,7.25)
\end{pspicture}

\begin{pspicture}[showgrid=true](-.7,-.5)(7.8,9)
  \newpsobject{laser}{optbox}{position=start, innerlabel} 
  \footnotesize\sffamily
   \psset{labeloffset=0.5}
   \pnode(0,1){DL}
   \pnode(0,2){OAP}
   \pnode(1.5,2){ST}
   \pnode(7,2){SP1}
   \pnode([offset=-1.5]ST){SP4}
   \pnode([Xnodesep=4.5]SP4){SP3}
   \pnode([offset=3.5]SP3){JL}
   \pnode([offset=2,Xnodesep=-5]SP1){SP2}
   \pnode([offset=4.5, Xnodesep=1.5]SP2){Det}
   \psset{mirrortype=extended, labeloffset=0.4, variable}
   \begin{optexp}
   \laser(DL)(OAP){\begin{tabular}{@{}c@{}}Dioden-\\laser\end{tabular}}
   \mirror[mirrorradius=1, variable=false](DL)(OAP)(ST){OAP}
   \mirror(ST)(SP1)(SP2){SP1}
   \mirror(SP1)(SP2)(Det){SP2}
   \mirror(ST)(SP4)(SP3){SP4}
   \mirror(SP4)(SP3)(JL){SP3}
   \beamsplitter[bssize=0.3, labelangle=315](SP4)(ST)(SP1){ST}
   \optplate[abspos=0.5, plateheight=0.5](ST)(SP1){CP}
   \laser(JL)(SP3){\begin{tabular}{@{}c@{}}Justage-\\laser\end{tabular}}
   \optdetector[label=1 15](SP2)(Det){Detektor}
   \optbox[optboxsize=2.5 1.5, label=0.9 180 b relative](SP2)(Det){Plasmareaktor}
   \optplate[platelinewidth=3pt, linecolor=blue!40!white, abspos=1.13](SP2)(Det)
   \frontlayer{\psline[arrows=->, linestyle=dashed, dash=2pt 2pt](4,6)([Xnodesep=0.2]\oenodeIn{})}
   \optplate[platelinewidth=3pt, linecolor=blue!40!white, abspos=3.6](SP2)(Det)
   \frontlayer{\psline[arrows=->, linestyle=dashed, dash=2pt 2pt](4,6)([Xnodesep=0.2, offset=-0.1]\oenodeIn{})}
   \addtopsstyle{Beam}{linewidth=1.5pt}
   \drawbeam[beampos=0.05, linecolor=red]{9}{6}{5}{7}{3}{4}{10}
   \drawbeam[linecolor=blue]{1}{2}{7}{3}{4}{10}
 \end{optexp}
 \rput[l](4,6){\footnotesize NaCl-Fenster}
\end{pspicture}
